org.koolapp.stream
Class NonBlockingCursor

org.koolapp.stream.Cursor
  org.koolapp.stream.NonBlockingCursor


public trait NonBlockingCursor
extends Cursor

A Cursor which can woken up by a NonBlockingHandler
to resume event delivery.

Function Summary
fun close(): Unit
fun isClosed(): Boolean
fun wakeup(): Unit
Wakes up the cursor so that it continues to raise events. A cursor usually
goes into a sleep state if the NonBlockingHandler cannot accept another event.
 

Function Detail

close

 fun isClosed(): Boolean

wakeup


 fun wakeup(): Unit

Wakes up the cursor so that it continues to raise events. A cursor usually
goes into a sleep state if the NonBlockingHandler cannot accept another event.
